verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against them,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and to the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, to the <S%H650>rivers<s%>, and to the <S%H1516>valleys<s%>; Behold, I, even I, will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon you, and I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> your high <S%H1116>places<s%>.

And your <S%H4196>altars<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, and your <S%H2553>images<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>: and I will cast <S%H5307>down<s%> your <S%H2491>slain<s%> men <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H1544>idols<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> the dead <S%H6297>carcases<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%>; and I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> your <S%H6106>bones<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> your <S%H4196>altars<s%>.

In all your <S%H4186>dwellingplaces<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste<s%>, and the high <S%H1116>places<s%> shall be <S%H3456>desolate<s%>; that your <S%H4196>altars<s%> may be laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> and made <S%H816>desolate<s%>, and your <S%H1544>idols<s%> may be <S%H7665>broken<s%> and <S%H7673>cease<s%>, and your <S%H2553>images<s%> may be cut <S%H1438>down<s%>, and your <S%H4639>works<s%> may be <S%H4229>abolished<s%>.
And the <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you, and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ Yet will I leave a <S%H3498>remnant<s%>, that ye may have some that shall <S%H6412>escape<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, when ye shall be <S%H2219>scattered<s%> through the <S%H776>countries<s%>.

And they that <S%H6412>escape<s%> of you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> me among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> whither they shall be carried <S%H7617>captives<s%>, because I am <S%H7665>broken<s%> with their <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, which hath <S%H5493>departed<s%> from me, and with their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, which go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%>: and they shall <S%H6962>lothe<s%> <S%H6440>themselves<s%> for the <S%H7451>evils<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> in all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.
And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and that I have not <S%H1696>said<s%> in <S%H2600>vain<s%> that I would <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> unto them.

¶ Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H5221>Smite<s%> with thine <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and <S%H7554>stamp<s%> with thy <S%H7272>foot<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H253>Alas<s%> for all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>! for they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

He that is far <S%H7350>off<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; and he that is <S%H7138>near<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and he that <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> and is <S%H5341>besieged<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>: thus will I <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon them.

Then shall ye <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when their <S%H2491>slain<s%> men shall be <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, upon every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>, in all the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and under every <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H424>oak<s%>, the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they did <S%H5414>offer<s%> <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%> to all their <S%H1544>idols<s%>.

So will I stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon them, and <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, yea, more <S%H4923>desolate<s%> than the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> toward <S%H1689>Diblath<s%>, in all their <S%H4186>habitations<s%>: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
